title: Looking for duo to get through silver
body:
Had to many afk's and trolls... Looking for someone who can play adc/mid/top quite well to climb.. Currently silver 4, didn't get silver 3 cause of an AFK haha..

IGN: IMT Bird

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is for help & support regarding technical issues with the game.

You'd be better off posting this under [Team Recruitment](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment).
